description:
The Foundation Day Fair is coming up, and the Academy Knights discuss what sort of shop they should open. An offhanded comment by Rae leads to the proposal of a cross-dressing café.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Himitsu no Wake wa Tagon Muyou.
La raison secrète doit rester bien cachée
The Secret Reason Must Not Be Told to Anyone
एक गुप्त रहस्य जो किसी से बता नहीं सकते
秘密の理由[ワケ]は他言無用.
